name: MAGAZINE {VAL}
description: This weapon must be reloaded after {VAL} uses. Mechs can reload with Stabilize and some systems.

name: REPEATING {VAL}
description: This weapon fires {VAL} times. You re-roll the attack even if its on the same target. E.g. Repeating 2 will have you roll for two separate attacks on the same target, indepedantly of eachother.

name: Jolly Cooperation
description: Systems and Weapons with this tag require outside help to use/for you to man them while an NHP keeps hold of the frame.
